system.purpose: Impressive bursts of strength and speed
system.warning: Can lead to aggression and wounds

system.purpose: Win friends and influence people against their will
system.warning: Can backfire and make people despise you

system.purpose: Turn metal into a warm, ashy goo
system.warning: Rarely affects your own hands, hardly ever

system.purpose: Create severe cold, even freeze things
Shoot a bolt of electricity from your fingertips
Project a 1-metre circle of invisible protection
system.warning: It can block air, so how long can you hold your breath?

system.purpose: Turn the normal five senses up to 11
Go invisible, including your clothes and gear
system.warning: Ewww, only the skin went invisible

system.purpose: Bots and even The Computer can obey you
system.warning: Can backfire and make bots and The Computer hate you

system.purpose: Damage someone's brain from a distance
system.warning: Can be reflected back at your own mind

system.purpose: Create severe heat, even light things aflame

system.warning: Did you just broadcast your own thoughts?

system.purpose: Bamf yourself to a new location you can see
system.warning: It is easy to forget to bring clothes and gear along for the ride

system.purpose: See through metal, flesh and similar materials
